type.name: ScriptCollection
type.summary: Represents a collection of Scripts attached to an object.

property.name: Count
property.summary: Gets the number of Scripts in this collection.

property.name: Item
property.summary: Gets the which has the specified name from this collection or returns null if no such script could be found.

method.name: Add
method.summary: Adds an existing to this collection.

method.name: Add
method.summary: Adds a new with specified name to this collection.

method.name: Clear
method.summary: Removes all Scripts from this collection.

method.name: Contains
method.summary: Determines whether a with specified name exists in this collection.

method.name: Remove
method.summary: Removes the with the specified name from this collection.

remarks.p: A script cannot appear twice in a single script collection.
Property this[string] represents an indexer that can be used to retrieve a with a specific name.
